description: A high-energy team known for their lightning-fast plays and thunderous dunks. They dominate the court with their relentless intensity.
name: The Thunderbolts

description: A powerhouse team with an imposing presence on the court. They combine strength, skill, and strategy to overpower their opponents.
name: The Titans

description: A team known for their fiery passion and explosive offense. They ignite the court with their fast-paced gameplay and sharp shooting.
name: The Blaze

description: A team that creates a whirlwind of excitement on the court. Their dynamic plays and seamless teamwork leave their opponents spinning.
name: The Vortex

description: A team that crashes through their opponents' defenses with unstoppable force. They leave a trail of chaos in their wake.
name: The Riptides

description: A team that prides itself on its defensive prowess. They are known for their suffocating defense and ability to protect the basket.
name: The Guardians

description: A team that thrives on unpredictability and unconventional strategies. They are known for their daring plays and ability to outsmart their opponents.
name: The Mavericks

description: A team with a cunning and venomous style of play. They strike swiftly and decisively, leaving their opponents in awe.
name: The Serpents
